transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji. Hello. Haan ji Bharat Stone Industries se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Executive: Haan ji bol raha hu.
Customer: Sir main senior manager baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se. Abhi aapne kal tak call kar not satisfied diya tha kya reason hai sir?
Customer: Bhaiya kya hai ki aap log call karke hamara samay kharab karte hain koi kaam to hamara ho nahi pa raha hai yaar. Kya dikat hai na to ek single inquiry aa rahi hai ye na business mil raha hai kuch nahi hai IndiaMART se kuch bhi nahi hai sunne hamare pass.
Executive: Bhai by leads to aa rahi hai sir by leads to kaise chahiye aapko by leads sir? Kya teen logo ko teen teen logo ko hamare kaam ke the jo hamare kaam se related the koi hamara stone ka kaam hai hamare pass aap metal ka bhejoge fiber ka bhejoge isse hamara kya ho jayega?
Customer: To usko to aap hata sakte hain na sir wo usko hata dijiye na kyuki wo to category wise aa jata hai koi search karta hai agar wo dal deta hai to wo us wajah se aa jata hai otherwise aap usko hata sakte hain.
Executive: Hata dete hain hum lekin usme kuch hai hi nahi by lead vagaira kuch kaam ki do teen humne consume bhi ki thi lekin unme sab log window shopping type ka kar rahe the.
Customer: Sir do teen hum aapko hafte ki 17 by lead dete hain sir do teen se thodi aap judge karoge sir.
Executive: Hum aapko hafte ki 17 by lead de rahe hain aap 17 consume karoge tab aapko lage tab waha se aapko do teen char aapko kaam ki milega.
Customer: Chalo 17 de do.
Executive: De rahe hain aapko 16 by aap sari to consume karo.
Customer: Are hamare kaam ki hum koi koi bhi kaise consume kar le bhai jo hamare kya the hum jo kaam karte hain wahi to consume karenge.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hello
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting relevant buyleads.

- Wasting time due to irrelevant calls.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to provide 17 buyleads per week.

- Asked customer to consume all buyleads.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, relevance
